trans-unit.target:
Duty Roulette: Leveling<tab>Leveling<tab><tab>A dungeon or trial will be selected at random from among those you have unlocked. Successful completion will earn you far greater rewards.
※Bonus EXP and gil will be awarded to compensate for the discrepancy between character and duty levels. A further percentage will then be added based on character level. ※The amount of bonus company seals awarded is determined by class/job level. ※The standard reward for this duty roulette category and all related bonuses are available once per day. The “adventurer in need” reward is always available. ※Joining this duty as a party meeting minimum size requirements will nullify any “adventurer in need” bonus. <tab>Duty Type: Light Party Dungeons & Trials

Duty Roulette: High-level Dungeons<tab>High-level Dungeons<tab><tab>A level 50/60/70/80/90 dungeon will be selected at random from among those you have unlocked. Successful completion will earn you far greater rewards.
※Bonus gil and EXP will be awarded to compensate for the discrepancy between character and duty levels. A further percentage will then be added based on character level. ※The standard reward for this duty roulette category and all related bonuses are available once per day. ※Joining this duty as a party meeting minimum size requirements will nullify any “adventurer in need” bonus. <tab>Duty Type: Level 50/60/70/80/90 Light Party Dungeons

Duty Roulette: Main Scenario<tab>Main Scenario<tab><tab>A main scenario duty will be selected at random from among those you have unlocked. Successful completion will earn you far greater rewards.
※Cutscenes cannot be skipped. ※Bonus gil and EXP will be awarded to compensate for the discrepancy between character and duty levels. A further percentage will then be added based on character level. ※The standard reward for this duty roulette category and all related bonuses are available once per day. ※Joining this duty as a party meeting minimum size requirements will nullify any “adventurer in need” bonus. <tab>Duty Type: Full Party Dungeons

Duty Roulette: Guildhests<tab>Guildhests<tab><tab>A guildhest will be selected at random from among those you have unlocked. Successful completion will earn you far greater rewards.
※Bonus EXP and gil will be awarded to compensate for the discrepancy between character and duty levels. A further percentage will then be added based on character level. ※The amount of bonus company seals awarded is determined by class/job level. ※The standard reward for this duty roulette category and all related bonuses are available once per day. ※Joining this duty as a party meeting minimum size requirements will nullify any “adventurer in need” bonus. ※Only light party guildhests will be selected when joining this duty as a group of four. There are no role restrictions when in a light party. <tab>Duty Type: Guildhests

Duty Roulette: Expert<tab>Expert<tab><tab>An expert dungeon will be selected at random from among those you have unlocked. Successful completion will earn you far greater rewards.
※Bonus gil will be awarded to compensate for the discrepancy between character and duty levels. A further percentage will then be added based on character level. ※The standard reward for this duty roulette category and all related bonuses are available once per day. ※Joining this duty as a party meeting minimum size requirements will nullify any “adventurer in need” bonus. <tab>Duty Type: Light Party Expert Dungeons

Duty Roulette: Trials<tab>Trials<tab><tab>A trial will be selected at random from among those you have unlocked. Successful completion will earn you far greater rewards.
※The standard reward for this duty roulette category and all related bonuses are available once per day. ※Joining this duty as a party meeting minimum size requirements will nullify any “adventurer in need” bonus. <tab>Duty Type: Trials

Daily Challenge: Frontline<tab>Frontline<tab><tab>The current daily Frontline battle (indicated under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Information<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>) will be joined. Successful completion will earn you far greater rewards.
※The daily challenge reward bonus is available once per day.<tab>Duty Type: Onsal Hakair (Danshig Naadam)

Duty Roulette: Level Cap Dungeons<tab>Level Cap Dungeons<tab><tab>A level 100 dungeon will be selected at random from among those you have unlocked. Successful completion will earn you far greater rewards.
※Bonus gil will be awarded to compensate for the discrepancy between character and duty levels. A further percentage will then be added based on character level. ※The standard reward for this duty roulette category and all related bonuses are available once per day. ※Joining this duty as a party meeting minimum size requirements will nullify any “adventurer in need” bonus. <tab>Duty Type: Level 100 Light Party Dungeons

Duty Roulette: Mentor<tab>Mentor<tab><tab>A mentor-oriented duty will be selected at random from among those you have unlocked. Successful completion will earn you far greater rewards.
※Only available if you have achieved battle mentor status. ※Bonus gil will be awarded to compensate for the discrepancy between character and duty levels. A further percentage will then be added based on character level. ※The standard reward for this duty roulette category and all related bonuses are available once per day. The “adventurer in need” reward is always available. <tab>Duty Type: Mentor-oriented Duties

Duty Roulette: Alliance Raids<tab>Alliance Raids<tab><tab>A 24-member alliance raid will be selected at random from among those you have unlocked. Successful completion will earn you far greater rewards.
※Bonus EXP and gil will be awarded to compensate for the discrepancy between character and duty levels. A further percentage will then be added based on character level. ※The standard reward for this duty roulette category and all related bonuses are available once per day.<tab>Duty Type: Alliance Raids

Duty Roulette: Normal Raids<tab>Normal Raids<tab><tab>An 8-man raid will be selected at random from among those you have unlocked. Successful completion will earn you far greater rewards.
※Bonus EXP and gil will be awarded to compensate for the discrepancy between character and duty levels. A further percentage will then be added based on character level. ※The standard reward for this duty roulette category and all related bonuses are available once per day. The “adventurer in need” reward is always available.<tab>Duty Type: Normal Raids

Chocobo Race: Sagolii Road<tab>Sagolii Road<tab><tab>Dedicated men and women working in harmony with their feathered companions, thundering towards the finish line for fame and fortune─that, my friend, is chocobo racing!
※Race class will be determined by current chocobo rating. ※When participating as a party, race class will be determined by the lowest-rated chocobo. ※Chocobo attributes will be synced to the lowest-rated chocobo. ※Party chat is available between race participants.<tab>

Chocobo Race: Costa del Sol<tab>Costa del Sol<tab><tab>Dedicated men and women working in harmony with their feathered companions, thundering towards the finish line for fame and fortune─that, my friend, is chocobo racing!
※Race class will be determined by current chocobo rating. ※When participating as a party, race class will be determined by the lowest-rated chocobo. ※Chocobo attributes will be synced to the lowest-rated chocobo. ※Party chat is available between race participants.<tab>

Chocobo Race: Tranquil Paths<tab>Tranquil Paths<tab><tab>Dedicated men and women working in harmony with their feathered companions, thundering towards the finish line for fame and fortune─that, my friend, is chocobo racing!
※Race class will be determined by current chocobo rating. ※When participating as a party, race class will be determined by the lowest-rated chocobo. ※Chocobo attributes will be synced to the lowest-rated chocobo. ※Party chat is available between race participants.<tab>

Chocobo Race: Random<tab>Random<tab><tab>Dedicated men and women working in harmony with their feathered companions, thundering towards the finish line for fame and fortune─that, my friend, is chocobo racing!
※A course will be selected at random from those available. ※Race class will be determined by current chocobo rating. ※When participating as a party, race class will be determined by the lowest-rated chocobo. ※Chocobo attributes will be synced to the lowest-rated chocobo. ※Party chat is available between race participants.<tab>

Chocobo Race: Sagolii Road (No Rewards)<tab>Sagolii Road (No Rewards)<tab><tab>Dedicated men and women working in harmony with their feathered companions, thundering towards the finish line for fame and fortune─that, my friend, is chocobo racing!
※Race will only feature current party members. ※When participating as a party, race class will be determined by the lowest-rated chocobo. ※Chocobo attributes will be synced to the lowest-rated chocobo. ※No experience or prizes will be rewarded. ※Party chat is available between race participants.<tab>

Chocobo Race: Costa del Sol (No Rewards)<tab>Costa del Sol (No Rewards)<tab><tab>Dedicated men and women working in harmony with their feathered companions, thundering towards the finish line for fame and fortune─that, my friend, is chocobo racing!
※Race will only feature current party members. ※When participating as a party, race class will be determined by the lowest-rated chocobo. ※Chocobo attributes will be synced to the lowest-rated chocobo. ※No experience or prizes will be rewarded. ※Party chat is available between race participants.<tab>

※Race will only feature current party members. ※When participating as a party, race class will be determined by the lowest-rated chocobo. ※Chocobo attributes will be synced to the lowest-rated chocobo. ※No experience or prizes will be rewarded. ※Party chat is available between race participants.<tab>

Chocobo Race: Random (No Rewards)<tab>Random (No Rewards)<tab><tab>Dedicated men and women working in harmony with their feathered companions, thundering towards the finish line for fame and fortune─that, my friend, is chocobo racing!
※A course will be selected at random from those available. ※Race will only feature current party members. ※When participating as a party, race class will be determined by the lowest-rated chocobo. ※Chocobo attributes will be synced to the lowest-rated chocobo. ※Party chat is available between race participants. ※No experience or prizes will be rewarded.<tab>

Crystalline Conflict (Casual Match)<tab>Casual Match<tab><tab>A dazzling array of arenas await at the Grand Companies' glamour-woven tactical training grounds. Designed with adventurers in mind, these strategic confrontations of but few competitors make for a thrilling challenge for newcome pups and Wolves' Den regulars alike.
At the end of the crystal line, who will stand victorious? Will it be you?<tab>

Crystalline Conflict (Ranked Match)<tab>Ranked Match<tab><tab>A dazzling array of arenas await at the Grand Companies' glamour-woven tactical training grounds. Designed with adventurers in mind, these strategic confrontations of but few competitors make for a thrilling challenge for newcome pups and Wolves' Den regulars alike.
At the end of the crystal line, who will stand victorious? Will it be you?
※Match results will affect Rising Stars and Crystal Credit. ※Players with comparable PvP tiers and risers will be matched with one another. ※Parties will be sorted by role, tier, riser, and credit to ensure relatively equal averages.<tab>
